list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: an individual thing or person regarded as single and complete but which can also form an individual component of a larger or more complex whole.
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_en: large areas of land made up of smaller units
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_vn: diện tích lớn của đất được tạo thành từ các đơn vị nhỏ hơn

list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: a device that has a specified function, especially one forming part of a complex mechanism.
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_vn: Hộp số và đơn vị truyền

list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: a quantity chosen as a standard in terms of which other quantities may be expressed.
